Posts.Content: Sep 24, 2007 06:11AM brenda69 wrote: Great to hear from you Steph, I have been watching this board since July 05.  I had IDC, triple negative, stage 1, grade3.  Lumpect, 4xAC, and rads.  I am so scard of a recurr, everyhting seems to hurt- upper back/ribs.  Last year, for no reason i was coughing and somehow cracked a rib.  T\Hrough out the whole thing and two bone scans later how can they say its nothing??????  My husband thinks I am a hypo, I love reading your posts.  Anyway, you give me strength when i need it most, and I didnt hear frm you so I was worried!!!
Posts.Title: how is triple neg brenda69 brenda69

Posts.Content: Jun 13, 2008 05:27AM brenda69 wrote: OK, I have a question for Jay!  I have been having mid back pain, and lower rt pain that is constant and worse when relaxing.  Onc kept saying its deginerative disease--not good enough, so i went to Rheumatologist- he took x-rays, blood work and bone scan.  lit up on left 4-5th, 7-8th, 10th ribs and 1st right rig.  Also the pubis symphsis lit up (could be due to ostietis) sp? Anyway, I wanted a pt/ct to confirm- he insisted on skeletal survey.  Tests came back with no mets-  my fear and questions are--- I thougth bone mets will not show up on x-rays unless 50% of the bone is destroyed (dr thought i was crazy).  now i am looking for a new dr. in Knox. TN   He did give me a presc for PT- after telling me the 1st visit that it is useless??  No pain killers for 4 mo.s now- do i have to go to the emergency room?  Sorry for ranting but it helps!
Posts.Title: PET Scan vs, Bone Scan JoyRebecca nuclear1

Posts.Content: brenda69 wrote: I dont post often, but I wanted some insight/stories on anyone with rib mets.  i have been having low back pain for over a year- My onc has done bone scans and it is always deginerative changes- fast forward to now, I am tired of hearing that and not getting help (meds/therapy/) so I go to a specialist- get a new scan and my back didnt show anything this time- but there was uptake in left 7th or 8th rib, 9th or 10th rib, and right 1st rib?  2 years ago i was coughing and apparantly fractured the 10th rib, so I knew about that one. There was also uptake to the region of the pubic symphysis.  I was dx with IDC, gr 3, stg 1 N0 in 2005. 4x AC and 35 rads.  My husband thinks I am a hypo sometimes but this time I am really worried.  The specialist didnt call me with the results I had to go by the hospital and pick them up myself.  It is also recommending a CT.  All I wanted was a diagnosis of arthritis or osteo and ways to manage it--- I might have got more??  Besides that- I turned 39 today and my son calls last night to tell me I am a grandma.  This is the weekend from hell--- Sorry I am venting-- did any one have rib mets present this way?? Brenda  Dx 7/7/2005, IDC, 2cm, Stage I, 0/3 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Jul 29, 2008 07:54AM brenda69 wrote: I totally understand what your going through, I have been having pain (everyday/3mo) in my lower back and right upper hip (pelvic?) it got to the point, my husband was saying your a hypochondriac ( I love him very much, but I quit telling him or anyone else that it hurts.  Quitely I am getting a second opinion.  From the way I understand it, the oncologists wont give you scans unless you are in extreme pain.  Apparently it doesnt make a difference when its diagnosed, the life frame is the same.  So I am just really upset about doctors too.  Just wanted to say I feel what your saying!!
